testcase.name: should initialize the board with default configuration
should return the size of the board
should return invalid cell status for negative column
should return invalid cell status for index out of bounds
should do nothing when setting the cell status for indexes greater than size of board
should set the cell status for the given row and col
should return invalid cell status for negative row
should do nothing when setting the cell status for negative index
should get the correct cell status for row and column number
should get the correct cell status for given row and column number
